scripts.db:view: sqlite3 -box trades.db "SELECT id, side, entry_price, exit_price, printf('%.2f', shares) as shares, printf('%.2f', pnl) as pnl, status, datetime(created_at, 'localtime') as created_at FROM trades UNION ALL SELECT '---' as id, '---' as side, '---' as entry_price, '---' as exit_price, '---' as shares, printf('%.2f', (SELECT SUM(pnl) FROM trades)) as pnl, 'TOTAL' as status, '---' as created_at"
